sentences.sContent: Over time, an implementation will accrete complexity as code is revisited for bug fixes and feature enhancements.
sentences.sContent_eng: Over time, an implementation will accrete complexity as code is revisited for bug fixes and feature enhancements.
sentences.sCn: 随着时间的迁移，系统实现与复杂度将共存，因为修改问题和添加新功能将会增加代码量。

synos.tran: 使依附；使连接；把…吸引过来

words.tran: 添加；增加物；连生；冲积层

trans.tranCn: 共生, 附着, 增加
trans.tranOther: to grow or cause to grow together; be or become fused
